title: What are some free online singing courses for absolute beginners (with preferably explanation of each step of the way) on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: When you’re a beginner you need immediate feedback from someone with a good ear and singing experience that will correct you when you do something wrong, otherwise you’re not learning from experience. Watching videos on how to sing are only telling you things. If you don’t know whether you’re doing something correctly you can’t change it. (It’s like reading an article about pole vaulting. The author can explain all they want about how to do it, but until you find a coach that will teach you to use the muscles and breath in the right way you will never really experience it). To learn how to sing correctly from the very beginning, get a voice teacher! Otherwise you’re just waisting your time.

I have seen people on YouTube giving basic lessons. Go to YouTube and check some out. Go to Google look for some free vocal coaches. In the end it may only be a few that are free. In your neighborhood check the recreation center. Sometimes you can find people hiding lesson at discount prices.
